name: Boutique Hotel Glaros

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would like to thank Alexandre and his staff for the great service he has provided during our stay in July 2011.
reviews.title: Service, Location and Friendliness in Naxos

reviews.text: Location of the hotel is great: right in front of St George beach. This beach is definitely not the best beach of the island but will provide access to restaurants, beach bars and all useful shops. From there you can go anywhere on the island. We have rented a car for 2 days and I definitely recommend it to explore the island that has so much to offer.
reviews.title: Spotless !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room was really good: they have recently renovated the hotel and it really looks like a boutique hotel with nice decoration and paintings, lounge music... We were located on the last floor which has the best view on St George but no private balcony, just a shared one.
reviews.title: Fantastic Small Hotel on St. George's Beach

reviews.text: I would definitely recommend this hotel for a trip to Naxos.
reviews.title: Best choice in Naxos

reviews.text: This hotel has been recently renovated and it is clear that the owners take great pride in the premises. There is a discreet notice just inside the hotel asking that you keep as much sand and water out of the hotel, and we did feel really guilty when we made any sort of mess. It is quite difficult not getting sand in the rooms when the location of the hotel is right on the beach ! We did not eat breakfast at the hotel so cannot comment on this aspect. However, the room was lovely and our balcony overlooking the beach was beautiful. There are a huge amount of restaurants in Naxos, all within walking distance of the hotel and Naxos town itself seemed extremely friendly and safe.
reviews.title: A very clean, modern hotel, extremely helpful staff
Beautiful decor
reviews.text: We had a lovely stay here though I considered slightly dropping the rating because our room was quite small and to be brutally honest lacked storage for our clothes. However that is a small negative in a glowing review.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The owners are truly fantastic and help to make your stay memorable. The cleanliness and quality of the decor is second to none. This hotel is superbly decorated and very very beautiful. On top of this its position right on the beach is exceptional. The management think of virtually everything and there is even a changing room for those who leave late after check out.
reviews.title: Excellent small hotel

reviews.text: Cannot recommend this enough though do try to to book a larger double room as the extra cost is very minimal.
reviews.title: A real jewel on the island of Naxos

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Congratulations to this lovely hotel you made our stay a wonderful one.
reviews.title: Views, Location and Great Host

reviews.text: Now to Naxos.
reviews.title: Good value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our first time trip to Naxos was made perfect by our stay at Hotel Glaros and the exceptional service provided by Alex, the owner. The modern boutiqe hotel is very clean, beautiful and has all the amenities that we required for our stay. We had a beautiful balcony overlooking the ocean from which we witnessed many gorgeous Naxian sunsets. It was the perfect place to celebrate our anniversary. Alex was incredibly helpful and went out of his way to ensure that we had everything we needed to have an enjoyable stay. Both his friendship and our stay at the hotel made our trip to Naxos one of the best we have had. Simply perfect!
reviews.title: Excellent hotel, exceptional service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Clean, modern boutique hotel with fast wifi and at a great location. A nice view of both the St George beach and the Naxos sunset.
reviews.title: Clean and good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Small family run hotel that is located metres from the beach.
reviews.title: Idilic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Modern boutique hotel with all the amenities you need.
reviews.title: The Best in Naxos Town!

reviews.text: Get a top floor superier room if you can, and watch the world go by.
reviews.title: Hip Boutique Hotel on the Beach

reviews.text: Naxos was the end of a 4 week Europe holiday for us and we stayed at Hotel Glaros for 4 nights and it was one of our favourite parts of our holiday. The hotel looks brand new after a recent renovation and is beautiful. Alex was extremely helpful as were his staff. The location is fantastic and a 1 minute walk to the beach and easy walk to all the nightlife and restaurants. We had a room on the first floor and our son had one next door. Both were extremely clean and comfortable and there is a great balcony with ocean views. We had 8 other friends stay here as well and they all loved it.
reviews.title: Fantastic stay and would recommend.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Naxos is a great place to visit to relax or do activites and my son and husband loved hiring a ATV quad bike and touring the island.
reviews.title: Good value for money, clean new rooms, good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Loved the hotel and the island.
reviews.title: Top Class Boutique Hotel - Fantastic Value for money

reviews.text: A few steps from St Georges beach, a walk from the ferry terminal, enjoyable experience
reviews.title: Just wonderful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Everything that has been said before in previous reviews is spot on.
reviews.title: It just gets better

description: Boutique Hotel Glaros is a beautiful beach hotel consisting of 13 rooms. It is ideally located right on sandy Saint George beach and just 300m from Naxos town centre.
